body_content.explanation: from or relating to the period of British history during the rule of King Charles III (from 2022):
examples: What can we expect from the new Carolean age?
The next era of British history under King Charles III will be known as the Carolean era.

body_content.explanation: from or relating to the period of British history during the rule of King Charles II (1660-1685):
examples: The Carolean era is also known as The Restoration.
It was a beautiful Carolean house with all the original oak panelling.
